item.name: PUT:/certified_products/{certifiedProductId}- 400 status and error on adding removed/invalid Test Tools to 2015 listings

exec: pm.test("Adding removed Test Tools to 2015 listing should give 400 status code and error in response", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'Transport Testing Tool' is not valid");
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'HL7 CDA National Health Care Surveys Validator' is not valid");
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'HL7 v2 Immunization Information System (IIS) Reporting Validation Tool' is not valid");
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'HL7 v2 Laboratory Results Interface (LRI) Validation Tool' is not valid");
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'HL7 v2 Syndromic Surveillance Reporting Validation Tool' is not valid");
pm.test("Adding Test Tool with invalid ID and valid Test Tool name to 2015 listing should give error in response", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("contains an invalid test tool 'HL7 CDA Cancer Registry Reporting Validation Tool'");

request.description: Adding removed Test Tools to 2015 listing should give 400 status code and error in response

item.name: PUT:/certified_products/{certifiedProductId} - 400 status and error for adding new/invalid Test Tools for 2014 listing

exec: pm.test("Adding new Test Tools to 2014 listing should give 400 status code and error in response", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'NIST General Validation Tool (GVT)' is not valid");
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'NCPDP Electronic Prescribing (eRx) Testing Tool' is not valid");
pm.test("Adding Test Tool with invalid ID and valid Test Tool name to 2014 listing should give error in response", function () {

request.description: Adding new Test Tools to 2014 listing should give 400 status code and error in response

item.name: PUT: /certified_products/{certifiedProductId} - listing edit request with invalid data in various fields

exec: pm.test("expect to receive 400 bad request for bad data in Test Data, Test standard, Test Functionality, SVAP and Test Procedure", function () {
pm.test("expect to see a warning for null Test Data ID and invalid name input", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test data 'test Test Method' is invalid for certification 170.315 (b)(6). ONC Test Method will be used instead.");
pm.test("expect to see an error for invalid Test Data ID", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test data ID '1000125' is invalid for the criterion 170.315 (g)(9)");
pm.test("expect to see an error for invalid Test Procedure ID", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Certification 170.315 (b)(6) contains an invalid test procedure ID: '100125'");
pm.test("expect to see an error for invalid SVAP ID", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Standards Version Advancement Process 170.204(a)(1) is not valid for criteria 170.315 (b)(6)");
pm.test("expect to see an error for invalid Test Functionality ID", function () {
pm.test("expect to see an error for invalid Test Functionality ID and name", function () {
pm.test("expect to see an error for invalid Test Standard ID", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Criteria 170.315 (b)(6) contains a test standard ID '2021' which does not exist for edition 2015");
